name: GELu (itch)
description:
GELu, a little circle stuck in a world he doesn't understand, with no friends in sight.  He knows though that there are deadly spikes around, and that he can move left and right, or even jump while making the world around him spin at the same time. At the end of each stage there is a boss, which can be beaten by our pal to go to the next level.

Game made using the Godot Engine for the 2nd VimJam. Every level ends with a boss, and the levels put the player in some sort of on the cliff (matching the on the edge restriction) situations which require a careful positioning.

My first game using Godot, and my second game overall. Source code here.

Controls

Left/A - move left

Right/D - move right

Down/S + Left/A - jump with counterclockwise spin

Down/S + Right/D - jump with clockwise spin
